title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-4.3 - Measurement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-4.3 - Measurement

State Regulations
(a) Total fluorides
in and on forage shall be determined by methods acceptable to the
commissioner. (b) Gaseous fluorides
in air will be collected and analyzed by methods acceptable to the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
257-4.3

Renumbered from 257-8.4

New

York State Register November 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 48, eff. 12/7/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
